text:
We like to meet our
customers where they are,
and so giving them

an option to use Amazon
Bedrock is huge because
everything's hosted within our VPC.
Our customers who
already trust AWS as a brand,

it's easier for them to
embrace this new technology
and for them to be able to
roll it out to their employees.

We chose Bedrock and the
tools associated with AWS

because we wanted optionality
with regard to what models

we were able to use, and
we also wanted security,
resiliency, and compliance.
We wanted to have insights and monitoring

around cost control and
governance and security.
Bedrock also comes
with the right compliance certifications
that makes our enterprise customers

feel comfortable using
these AI technologies
and large language models.

Amazon Bedrock allows that
data to be their own data

and not shared with any
of the model providers.
We've got a vision

that it is basically following
a responsible AI principle,

and lately we are using
and relying on Bedrock.
